ComicInfo.Title: Chapter One: Weren't We the Bad Guys?
ComicInfo.Summary:
Syd Dallas is responsible for pop culture's greatest hero: THE DOMAIN! But his sons Miles and David have a complicated relationship with both the creation and their creator. Can they convince their dad to fight for their family's legacy?
This fun and heartfelt series written and illustrated by Eisner winner CHIP ZDARSKY (SEX CRIMINALS, Daredevil) explores a WILD ALTERNATE WORLD where comic book creators aren't properly acknowledged or compensated for their creations!! Crazy, I know!! Hi, it's me, CHIP! I'm writing this solicitation!
The print version was published by Image Comics in June, 2022.
Note: originally self-published on substack in parts (completed November 2021).
